column4: as a fan of mplayer, just looked at smplayer, it is nice! thanks :P!

it became my favorite media player after only a few days of use. It works, it works WELL, and it plays pretty much any file I throw at it with no stuttering/anything (after playing around a bit with settings)
Anything that is a fork of mplayer deserves to trash other players :P...
And what about packages, are the repos the same?
And do you get most of the software which are in 32bit, to your 64 bit?
Awesome thanks.. Any command to check the current version of the distro?
Any known reasons why the grub menu dones't autoupdate to include the latest kernels?
no idea, i don't use grub, why are you asking me?
You know quite a few things :)
